column4: did you do any upgrades lately on your ubuntu - before it stopped detecting the sata drives ?
I just put a pci sata/pata card in :)
i had some issues with sata on my ubuntu gutsy install i had to append the grub loader with all_generic_ide for it to see my sata drives
try changing ur /boot/grub/menu.lst so where it has the kernel line it has   all_generic_ide at the end - then reboot see if that works
